### Optimisations Performance

#### Avant
```sql
-- âŒ RequÃªte N+1 (1 + N requÃªtes)
SELECT * FROM products;  -- 1 requÃªte

-- Pour chaque produit:
SELECT * FROM variations WHERE product_id = ?;  -- N requÃªtes
SELECT * FROM stocks WHERE product_id = ?;      -- N requÃªtes
```

#### AprÃ¨s
```sql
-- âœ… RequÃªte unique avec JOIN
SELECT
  p.*,
  json_agg(v.*) as variations,
  json_agg(s.*) as stocks
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN variations v ON p.id = v.product_id
LEFT JOIN stocks s ON p.id = s.product_id
GROUP BY p.id;
```

#### Gains
```

â”‚  MÃ©trique        Avant    â†’    AprÃ¨s   â”‚
â”œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¤
â”‚  Temps rÃ©ponse   1250ms  â†’    80ms     â”‚
```
